metadata.title: CHUNG Toddler Little Big Girls Dance Bike Play Shorts Under Dress Skirt School Uniform Underpants 4 Pack 2-9Y
features: PACK: Package includes 4 pairs shown as the FIRST image. Multiple colors selection for your girls to choose according to occasions and moods.
SIZE: Sizing for 2-9 years girls,Pls check the size details before order, we define size based on lay relax waistline.

FABRIC: Made of quality modal cotton, cool lightweight and nice stretch, Fit perfectly as undergarment or shorts underdress skirt or school uniform. Pls attention it's thinner, adding coverage without adding heat.
DESIGN: Elastic waistband and bowknot decoration, no pilling and bunching,with no compression but snuggish perfectly.easy put on and take off.
USE: Work well under skirt dress school uniform and long tops, girls could enjoy in DANCING/SPORTING/PLAYING/SLEEPING time.
description: CHUNG Toddler Little Big Girls Dance Bike Play Shorts Under Dress Skirt School Uniform Underpants 4 Pack 2-9Y   We always concentrate to provide customers with high quality products at competitive price and trying to offer the first-rate service, and we hope you could enjoy the shopping time.  Condition: Brand New + High Quality ! Material: 95% Modal  Feature: Soft, Comfortable, Breathable, Lightweight  Color: 4colors,2 multipack  A must have for daily wear  Suitable for sports, dancing, school or under skirts for added coverage, work great under a dress, short skirt, shorts, long tops, even jeans, ideal for bedtime, gym, yoga, cycling, swimming, dancing
